name: RE4CTOR by Apollo Mobile
tag_list: mobile-applications, mobile-content-management, iphone, android, symbian, windows-mobile, java, real-time, interactive-television
overview:
Apollo Mobile is the company behind RE4CTOR (pronounced Re-act-or), a new technology that helps businesses and consumers interact using mobile phones.

RE4CTORâ€™s application-based content management system works on nearly all the four billion mobile phone handsets in the world today, without the need to develop apps for each phone or operating system.

RE4CTOR enables businesses in the media, healthcare, travel, retail and other sectors to cut costs and entertain and engage with clients, opening up brand new revenue opportunities.

RE4CTOR is already being used to power interactive television shows for broadcasters including YLT, SWT, and Mediaset. It is powering mobile-based market research for companies such as WPP’s Kantar Group and the US-based Media Behaviour Institute, and to help EMI build communities for music fans. RE4CTOR is powering innovating health solutions companies such as Ubiqihealth, providing mobile & web tools to aid people manage chronic disease conditions.

Apollo Mobile is based in London, with offices in New York and Vaasa, Finland.
